Uses of Package
com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

  • Packages that use com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util 
    Package Description
    com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
    Components for App Inventor runtime library.
    com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util
    Utilities supporting the component code.
  • Classes in com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util used by com.google.appinventor.components.runtime 
    Class and Description
    AlignmentUtil
    Utilities for centering contents of arrangements and screen
    AppInvHTTPD 
    AsyncCallbackPair
    Interface for callback pair with AsyncCallbackPair.onSuccess(Object) and AsyncCallbackPair.onFailure(String).
    BoundingBox
    Bounding box abstraction, similar to android.graphics.Rect.
    FileUtil.FileException
    Exception class for reporting back media-related error numbers from ErrorMessages, which the caller can in turn pass to Form.dispatchErrorOccurredEvent if needed.
    FullScreenVideoUtil
    Used by the Form class to display videos in fullscreen.
    GameInstance
    A container for information about a GameInstance for use with the App Inventor game framework.
    IClientLoginHelper
    An interface defining the functionality of ClientLoginHelper.
    ITextToSpeech
    This abstracts out what a text to speech implementation needs to have.
    OnInitializeListener
    This interface exposes a callback method, onInitialize(), that will be called by the Form activity after the app is initialized.
    TimerInternal
    Helper class for components containing timers, such as Timer and Sprite.
    YailList
    The YailList is a wrapper around the gnu.list.Pair class used by the Kawa framework.
  • Classes in com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util used by com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util 
    Class and Description
    AccountChooser
    Get an account to Authenticate an application to: If there is only one account, use it If there are no accounts, create one and use it If there are multiple accounts: prompt the user to choose an account remember the choice for next time
    AsyncCallbackPair
    Interface for callback pair with AsyncCallbackPair.onSuccess(Object) and AsyncCallbackPair.onFailure(String).
    BoundingBox
    Bounding box abstraction, similar to android.graphics.Rect.
    CustomMediaController
    A modified MediaController that allows adding to a android.view.ViewGroup instead of the Window that Android adds the MediaController to.
    FileUtil.FileException
    Exception class for reporting back media-related error numbers from ErrorMessages, which the caller can in turn pass to Form.dispatchErrorOccurredEvent if needed.
    IClientLoginHelper
    An interface defining the functionality of ClientLoginHelper.
    ITextToSpeech
    This abstracts out what a text to speech implementation needs to have.
    ITextToSpeech.TextToSpeechCallback
    Callback specifying methods for successful and failed attempts to generate speech.
    MediaUtil.MediaSource 
    NanoHTTPD
    A simple, tiny, nicely embeddable HTTP 1.0 (partially 1.1) server in Java
    NanoHTTPD.Response
    HTTP response.
    PlayerListDelta
    An object to store lists of the change in the players list of an instance.
    WebServiceUtil
    These commands post to the Web and get responses that are assumed to be JSON structures: a string, a JSON array, or a JSON object.
    YailList
    The YailList is a wrapper around the gnu.list.Pair class used by the Kawa framework.
